ModMetaData.name: Misc. XPatches CE only 'CORE'
ModMetaData.author: Haplo
ModMetaData.description:
Load this AFTER Miscellaneous 'CORE' and Combat Extended!
!!! Use Misc. XPatches instead if you also have Misc. Turrets, Objects active !!!
This mod makes the following Miscellaneous Mods compatible to Combat Extended:
- Miscellaneous 'CORE'
The following Miscellaneous Mods can be used in CE without patching:
- Misc. Bees and Honey
- Misc. TrainingFacility
- Misc. Robots
- Misc. WeaponRepair
- Misc. MapGenerator / Urban / Factionbases
- Misc. Incidents
- Misc. EndGame
